mapper.select: select a.id,a.create_time,a.name,a.logo,a.creator,a.creator as 'creatorMember.id',a.managers,a.tags,a.introduce, a.can_post,a.status,a.topic_review,(select count(c.id) from tbl_group_topic as c where group_id=a.id and c.status=1) as topicCount, (select count(*) from tbl_group_fans as d where group_id=a.id) as fansCount, b.name as 'creatorMember.name' from tbl_group as a left join tbl_member as b on a.creator=b.id where a.id = #{id}

select a.id,a.create_time,a.name,a.logo,a.creator,a.creator as 'creatorMember.id',a.managers,a.tags,a.introduce, a.can_post,a.status,a.topic_review,(select count(c.id) from tbl_group_topic as c where group_id=a.id and c.status=1) as topicCount, (select count(*) from tbl_group_fans as d where group_id=a.id) as fansCount, b.name as 'creatorMember.name' from tbl_group as a left join tbl_member as b on a.creator=b.id WHERE a.status = 1 AND d.member_id = #{memberId} order by a.id DESC
mapper.update: update tbl_group set status=(CASE WHEN status=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) where id = #{id}
